Hey,
I bought this game a long long time ago and use to read these e-mails to
see if anything would come up.  Well now Im no longer intrested so I
would like to be taken off.  It would of been nice if instructions on
how to get off where bellow but oh well.  So Im just asking you guys for
a little help. To bad they never made the follow up to the first
Gladiator b/c that game would of rocked.  Oh well thats life.
Emmanuel
